SELECT /* AraCtr.selectApprReqList */ A.STR_ID , A.STR_NM , A.MBL_NO , B.CAMP_ID , B.CAMP_NM , B1.INFO_DESC , TO_CHAR(B1.BGN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B1.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , B2.OFF_DESC , B2.OFF_TYP , B3.CHL_DESC , B3.CHL_TYP , B4.OFFCPN_NM , B4.CPN_TYP , B41.DTL_NM , B41.DTL_DESC , B4.CPN_MNY , B4.CPN_CNT , B4.CPN_SUM , B4.CPN_MST , TO_CHAR(B4.CRE_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CRE_DT , B5.OFFGFT_NM , B6.CHLSMS_NM , B7.CHLEML_NM , TO_CHAR(B8.CRE_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REQ_DTTM , B9.RES_NM , TO_CHAR(B9.CRE_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RES_DTTM FROM ARA_STR A , ARA_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA_CAMPINFO B1 ON B1.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_CAMPOFF B2 ON B2.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_CAMPCHL B3 ON B3.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_OFFCPN B4 ON B4.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL B41 ON B41.MST_CD = 'C007' AND B41.DTL_CD = B4.CPN_TYP LEFT JOIN ARA_OFFGFT B5 ON B5.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_CHLSMS B6 ON B6.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_CHLEML B7 ON B7.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_APPRREQ B8 ON B8.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_APPRRES B9 ON B9.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.CTR_ID = #{ctrid} AND B.STR_ID = A.STR_ID AND B4.CAMP_ID IS NOT NULL AND B8.CAMP_ID IS NOT NULL AND B9.CAMP_ID IS NULL ORDER BY B.CAMP_ID DESC
